## crop data

```{r}
#install packages
install.packages('FAOSTAT')
library(FAOSTAT)
```

```{r}
#download data
setwd("~/Desktop")
data_folder <- "data_raw"
fao_metadata <- FAOsearch() 
FAOsearch(dataset = "", full = FALSE)
crop_data <- get_faostat_bulk(code = "QCL", data_folder = data_folder)
#View full dataset
View(crop_data)
```
